title: Google\Cloud\Talent\V4beta1\EducationRecord
name: EducationRecord
description:
Resource that represents an education record of a candidate.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.EducationRecord

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.start_date
params.description: The start date of the education.

params.name: data.end_date
params.description: The end date of the education.

params.name: data.expected_graduation_date
params.description: The expected graduation date if currently pursuing a degree.

params.name: data.school_name
params.description: The name of the school or institution. For example, "Stanford University", "UC Berkeley", and so on. Number of characters allowed is 250.

params.name: data.address
params.description: The physical address of the education institution.

params.name: data.degree_description
params.description: The full description of the degree. For example, "Master of Science in Computer Science", "B.S in Math". Number of characters allowed is 100.

params.name: data.structured_degree
params.description: The structured notation of the degree.

params.name: data.description
params.description: The description of the education. Number of characters allowed is 100,000.

params.name: data.is_current
params.description: If this education is current.

params.name: data.school_name_snippet
params.description: Output only. The school name snippet shows how the [school_name][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.EducationRecord.school_name] is related to a search query in search result. It's empty if the [school_name][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.EducationRecord.school_name] isn't related to the search query.

params.name: data.degree_snippet
params.description: Output only. The job description snippet shows how the [Degree][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.Degree] is related to a search query in search result. It's empty if the [Degree][google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.Degree] isn't related to the search query.
